attributes.additional_details: The price of petrol just keeps going up and up. Many people whose main source to get around and get to work or college is their car. So with petrol prices keep rising then people's wages are being cut because they have to spend all their money on petrol as it is so expensive. I know that petrol prices go up with oil prices but I know that when the price of oil drops the petrol doesn't making it cost a lot for people to get around.
